amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-167 stating that it is the sense of Congress that the use of a family relationship by a lobbyist who is an immediate family member of a Member of Congress to gain special advantages over other lobbyists is inappropriate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castle amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Castle.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Castle amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
